LanguageData.BardelSyndrome.stages.2.label: Bardel syndrome (mania)
LanguageData.BardelSyndrome.stages.2.description: I will construct a spaceship on my own! This is going to be grand!
LanguageData.BardelSyndrome.stages.3.label: Bardel syndrome (frightened)
LanguageData.BardelSyndrome.stages.3.description: What is going on here? Why are they all looking at me this way?
LanguageData.BardelSyndrome.stages.4.label: Bardel syndrome (furious)
LanguageData.BardelSyndrome.stages.4.description: Those maggots won't stand in my way anymore! I'll crush'em if necessary!
